meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>carve</kanji> then you <kanji>carve</kanji> again. So much carving until, wait, wow, it looks like something! All that carving became a <vocabulary>sculpture</vocabulary>!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
